hypothesis: Bryan Cranston and Vince Gilligan worked together.
premise: + Breaking Bad + Breaking Bad is an American crime drama television series created and produced by Vince Gilligan . + Bryan Cranston + He is best known for portraying Walter White on the AMC crime drama series Breaking Bad , Hal on the Fox comedy series Malcolm in the Middle , and Dr. Tim Whatley in five episodes of the NBC comedy series Seinfeld . + Bryan Cranston + He has also appeared in several acclaimed films such as Saving Private Ryan ( 1998 ) , Little Miss Sunshine ( 2006 ) , Drive ( 2011 ) , Argo ( 2012 ) and Godzilla ( 2014 ) . + Bryan Cranston + Cranston has directed episodes of various television series , including seven episodes of Malcolm in the Middle , three episodes of Breaking Bad , two episodes of Modern Family and one episode of The Office . + Bryan Cranston + After becoming one of the producers of Breaking Bad in 2011 , he also won the award for Outstanding Drama Series twice .
explanation_1: Bryan Cranston and Vince Gilligan worked together on Breaking Bad.
input_string: explain nli hypothesis: Bryan Cranston and Vince Gilligan worked together. premise:  + Breaking Bad + Breaking Bad is an American crime drama television series created and produced by Vince Gilligan . + Bryan Cranston + He is best known for portraying Walter White on the AMC crime drama series Breaking Bad , Hal on the Fox comedy series Malcolm in the Middle , and Dr. Tim Whatley in five episodes of the NBC comedy series Seinfeld . + Bryan Cranston + He has also appeared in several acclaimed films such as Saving Private Ryan ( 1998 ) , Little Miss Sunshine ( 2006 ) , Drive ( 2011 ) , Argo ( 2012 ) and Godzilla ( 2014 ) . + Bryan Cranston + Cranston has directed episodes of various television series , including seven episodes of Malcolm in the Middle , three episodes of Breaking Bad , two episodes of Modern Family and one episode of The Office . + Bryan Cranston + After becoming one of the producers of Breaking Bad in 2011 , he also won the award for Outstanding Drama Series twice .
answer_string: entailment  "explanation: "  bryan cranston and vince gilligan worked together on breaking bad.
